name: Yellow Dream
description:
I had this dream a while ago and I painted it in art classes in the lavender fields, there were animals in love, a superhero with a broken heart, a fairy in pajamas, animals in costumes and a little dog loving fire, but the most important thing was all the stars and flowers that were there, it was a totally yellow dream 🐇⛰️☀️

PS: For the little animals the easiest thing to do is to name the dreams after colors 🌼⭐🌼⭐🌼⭐🌼⭐🌼⭐


SIZE: 2200 X 3000 px
MOOD: Happy 
Procreate and Adobe Fresco
